actions.description: The unicorn makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Hooves

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Horn

actions.description: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.
actions.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)

actions.description: The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 feet of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.
actions.name: Teleport (1/Day)

legendary_actions.description: The unicorn makes one attack with its hooves.
legendary_actions.name: Hooves.

legendary_actions.description: The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.
legendary_actions.name: Shimmering Shield (Costs 2 Actions).

legendary_actions.description: The unicorn magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points.
legendary_actions.name: Heal Self (Costs 3 Actions).

legendary_description: The unicorn can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The unicorn regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
name: Unicorn

traits.description: If the unicorn moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
traits.name: Charge

traits.description:
The unicorn's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The unicorn can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

At will: detect evil and good, druidcraft, pass without trace

1/day each: calm emotions, dispel evil and good, entangle
traits.name: Innate Spellcasting

traits.description: The unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.name: Magic Resistance

traits.description: The unicorn's weapon attacks are magical.
traits.name: Magic Weapons
